name: Quad II
overview: Four sided Arkanoid where each player controls a pair of paddles on each side of the screen. The aim of the game is to clear the screen. Some stones turn into some kind of stuff when cleared, which, when caught with the club, gives additional points. By the way, skulls are less suitable for catching, avoid them if you can. Developed by Matthias Weber and published in Magic Disk 64 1990/02.
